text: Héctor René Lavandera, usually known as René Lavand (24 September 1928 – 7 February 2015), was a magician from Argentina. He appeared in Ed Sullivan's and Johnny Carson's television shows as well as shows at Hollywood's Magic Castle. Lavand died of pneumonia at the Chacabuco Clinic in Tandil, Argentina aged 86. File:Estatua de René Lavand Tandil 01.jpg|Statue of René Lavand in the city of Tandil (Argentina).
